actions.recommendation: You have already started cutting down your smoking. I encourage you to go full steam ahead and quit!
Monitor your BP, continue taking your medication, reduce salt, take magnesium, try to stop smoking, start exercising gently and then follow up with your doctor.
Please try to pay attention to reducing your stress levels. Consider exercise, breathing exercises and getting enough rest and relaxation time.

High homocysteine levels can increase your risk of heart disease. This can be lowered by taking B vitamins in their active form. Consider supplementing with phytomulti or homocysteine lowering formula from solal.
An increased BMI and waist circumference increases your risk of cardiovascular and chronic disease. Try to reduce alcohol, increase your exercise and eat a healthy diet.
